reason.label: This article may require copy editing for:

copyedit.label: Copy edit
copyedit.desc: This page needs copy editing for grammar, style, cohesion, tone, and/or spelling.

for.label: This article may require copy editing for:

translation.label: Needs translation
translation.desc: This page is written in a language other than English and needs translation.

prose.label: Prose
prose.desc: This page is in a list format that is better presented using prose.

roughtranslation.label: Rough translation
roughtranslation.desc: This page is poorly translated and must be updated.

deadend.label: Dead end
deadend.desc: This page has no links to other pages.

externallinks.label: External links
externallinks.desc: This page"s external links do not follow content policies or guidelines.

orphan.label: Orphan
orphan.desc: No other pages link to this page.

overlinked.label: Too many links
overlinked.desc: This page has too many duplicate and/or irrelevant links.

morecategories.label: Improve categories
morecategories.desc: This page may require additional categories.

uncategorised.label: Uncategorised
uncategorised.desc: This page doesn"t belong to any categories.

historymerge.label: History Merge
historymerge.desc: A cut-and-paste move has occured resulting in loss of attribution.

originalpage.label: The page from where the content was copied.

underlinked.label: Underlinked
underlinked.desc: This page may require additional wikilinks

autobiography.label: Autobiography
autobiography.desc: This page is an autobiography and is not written neutrally.

coi.label: Conflict of interest
coi.desc: This page creator or major contributor may have a conflict of interest.

globalize.label: Globalize
globalize.desc: This page may not represent a worldwide view of the subject.

overcoverage.label: Overcoverage
overcoverage.desc: This page has extensive bias and/or disproportional coverage towards one or more specific regions.

peacock.label: Peacock
peacock.desc: This page contains peacock terms that promote the subject without adding information.

pov.label: POV
pov.desc: This page does not maintain a neutral point of view.

recentism.label: Recent event slant
recentism.desc: This page is slanted towards recent events.

toofewopinions.label: Too few viewpoints
toofewopinions.desc: This page does not include all significant viewpoints.

undue.label: Undue weight
undue.desc: This page lends undue weight to certain aspects of the subject but not others.

weasel.label: Weasel
weasel.desc: This page"s neutrality is compromised by the use of weasel words.

notability.label: General
notability.desc: The page"s subject may not meet the general notability guideline.

notabilityAcademics.label: Academic
notabilityAcademics.desc: The page"s subject may not meet the notability guideline for academics.

notabilityBiographies.label: Biographies
notabilityBiographies.desc: The page"s subject may not meet the notability guideline for biographies.

notabilityBooks.label: Books
notabilityBooks.desc: The page"s subject may not meet the notability guideline for books.

notabilityCompanies.label: Companies
notabilityCompanies.desc: The page"s subject may not meet the notability guideline for companies.

notabilityEvents.label: Events
notabilityEvents.desc: The page"s subject may not meet the notability guideline for events.

notabilityFilms.label: Films
notabilityFilms.desc: The page"s subject may not meet the notability guideline for films.

notabilityMusic.label: Music
notabilityMusic.desc: The page"s subject may not meet the notability guideline for music.

notabilityPlaces.label: Places
notabilityPlaces.desc: The page"s subject may not meet the notability guideline for places.

notabilityNeologisms.label: Neologisms
notabilityNeologisms.desc: The page"s subject may not meet the notability guideline for neologisms.

notabilityNumbers.label: Numbers
notabilityNumbers.desc: The page"s subject may not meet the notability guideline for numbers.

notabilityProducts.label: Products
notabilityProducts.desc: The page"s subject may not meet the notability guideline for products and services.

notabilitySport.label: Sports
notabilitySport.desc: The page"s subject may not meet the notability guideline for sports and athletics.

notabilityWeb.label: Web content
notabilityWeb.desc: The page"s subject may not meet the notability guideline for web content.

sourcesexist.label: Sources Exist
sourcesexist.desc: The subject has enough sources to demonstrate notability but they are not present in the page.

disputed.label: Accuracy issues
disputed.desc: This page has questionable factual accuracy.

linkrot.label: Bare URLs
linkrot.desc: This page uses bare URLs for references, which are prone to link rot.

citationstyle.label: Citation style
citationstyle.desc: This page has unclear or inconsistent inline citations.

hoax.label: Hoax
hoax.desc: This page may be a complete hoax.

morefootnotes.label: More footnotes
morefootnotes.desc: This page has some references, but insufficient in-text citations.

blp.label: This is a biography of a living person

refimprove.label: More references
refimprove.desc: This page needs additional references or sources for verification.

nosignificantcoverage.label: No significant coverage
nosignificantcoverage.desc: This page has some references, but they do not show that there has been significant coverage of the subject

blpsources.label: More sources (BLP)
blpsources.desc: This page about a living person (BLP) needs additional sources citations for verification.

nofootnotes.label: No footnotes
nofootnotes.desc: This page has references, but no in-text citations.

unreferenced.label: No references
unreferenced.desc: This page has no references at all.

originalresearch.label: Original research
originalresearch.desc: This page has original research or unverified claims.

primarysources.label: Primary sources
primarysources.desc: This page relies too heavily on primary sources, and needs secondary sources.

blp.label: This is a biography of a living person

selfpublished.label: Self-published sources
selfpublished.desc: This page may contain improper references to self-published sources.

onesource.label: Single source
onesource.desc: This page relies largely or entirely upon a single source.

thirdparty.label: Third-party sources
thirdparty.desc: This page relies too heavily on affiliated sources, and needs third-party sources.

unreliable.label: Unreliable sources
unreliable.desc: This page"s references may not be reliable sources.

onlyprimarysources.label: Only primary sources
onlyprimarysources.desc: This page only references primary sources.

condense.label: Condense
condense.desc: This page has too many section headers dividing up its content.

leadmissing.label: Lead missing
leadmissing.desc: This page has no lead section and one should be written.

leadrewrite.label: Lead rewrite
leadrewrite.desc: This page"s lead section needs to be rewritten to comply with guidelines.

reason.label: This article may require copy editing for:

leadtoolong.label: Lead too long
leadtoolong.desc: This page"s lead section is too long and should be shortened.

leadtooshort.label: Lead too short
leadtooshort.desc: This page"s lead section is too short and should be expanded.

cleanupreorganise.label: Reorganise
cleanupreorganise.desc: This page is in need of reorganization to comply with layout guidelines.

sections.label: Sections
sections.desc: This page needs to be broken into sections.

closeparaphrasing.label: Close paraphrasing
closeparaphrasing.desc: This page contains close paraphrasing of a copyrighted source.

source.label: Please add a URL for that source:

copypaste.label: Copy and paste
copypaste.desc: This page appears to have been copied and pasted from a source.

url.label: Please add a URL for that source.

nonfree.label: Copyrighted content
nonfree.desc: This page contains excessive or improper use of copyrighted materials.

Copyviorevdel.label: Revision Deletion
Copyviorevdel.desc: Certain revisions of the page violates copyright policies.

url.label: Please add a URL for that source.

start.label: The oldid number of the diff wherein the copyright violation was added.

end.label: The oldid number of the diff wherein the copyright violation was last visble.

start2.label: Same as second parameter; usable for a second range of diffs.

end2.label: Same as third parameter; usable for a second range of diffs.

advert.label: Advertisement
advert.desc: This page is written like an advertisement.

confusing.label: Confusing
confusing.desc: This page is confusing or unclear.

reason.label: This article may require copy editing for:

essaylike.label: Essay
essaylike.desc: This page is written like an essay and needs cleanup.

incomprehensible.label: Incomprehensible
incomprehensible.desc: This page is very hard to understand or incomprehensible

notenglish.label: Incorrect language
notenglish.desc: This page is written in an incorrect language and needs translation.

manual.label: Manual
manual.desc: This page is written like a manual or guidebook.

newsrelease.label: News release
newsrelease.desc: This page reads like a news release.

overlydetailed.label: Overly detailed
overlydetailed.desc: This page contains an excessive amount of intricate detail.

technical.label: Technical
technical.desc: This page is too technical for the uninitiated reader.

tense.label: Tense
tense.desc: This page is written in an incorrect tense.

tone.label: Tone
tone.desc: Tone of this page is not appropriate.

overquotation.label: Too many quotations
overquotation.desc: This page contains too many or too-lengthy quotations for an encyclopedic entry.

unfocused.label: Unfocused
unfocused.desc: This page lacks focus or is about more than one topic.

allplot.label: All plot
allplot.desc: This page is almost entirely a plot summary.

expandlanguage.label: Expand language
expandlanguage.desc: This page can be expanded with material from a foreign-language Wikipedia

langcode.label: Language of the foreign-language wikipedia (two/three-letter code):

otherarticle.label: Name of the article in the original language:

expert.label: Expert needed
expert.desc: This page needs attention from an expert on the subject.

reason.label: This article may require copy editing for:

fiction.label: Fiction
fiction.desc: This page fails to distinguish between fact and fiction.

inuniverse.label: Fictional perspective
inuniverse.desc: This page subject is fictional and needs rewriting from a non-fictional perspective.

outofdate.label: Out of date
outofdate.desc: This page needs out-of-date information removed or updated.

plot.label: Plot
plot.desc: This page"s plot summary is too long or excessively detailed.

underreview.label: Under review
underreview.desc: You intend to assess the article but it will take some time. Tag to avoid patrolling redundancy.

update.label: Update
update.desc: This page needs additional up-to-date information added.

R-from-alternative-language.label: {{R from alternative language}}
R-from-alternative-language.desc: redirect from or to a title in another language

R-from-acronym.label: {{R from acronym}}
R-from-acronym.desc: redirect from an acronym (e.g. POTUS) to its expanded form

R-from-initialism.label: {{R from initialism}}
R-from-initialism.desc: redirect from an initialism (e.g. AGF) to its expanded form

R-from-MathSciNet-abbreviation.label: {{R from MathSciNet abbreviation}}
R-from-MathSciNet-abbreviation.desc: redirect from MathSciNet publication title abbreviation to the unabbreviated title

R-from-NLM-abbreviation.label: {{R from NLM abbreviation}}
R-from-NLM-abbreviation.desc: redirect from a NLM publication title abbreviation to the unabbreviated title

R-from-other-capitalisation.label: {{R from other capitalisation}}
R-from-other-capitalisation.desc: redirect from a title with another method of capitalisation

R-from-modification.label: {{R from modification}}
R-from-modification.desc: redirect from a modification of the target"s title, such as with words rearranged

R-from-plural.label: {{R from plural}}
R-from-plural.desc: redirect from a plural word to the singular equivalent

R-to-plural.label: {{R to plural}}
R-to-plural.desc: redirect from a singular noun to its plural form

R-from-verb.label: {{R from verb}}
R-from-verb.desc: redirect from an English-language verb or verb phrase

R-from-adjective.label: {{R from adjective}}
R-from-adjective.desc: redirect from an adjective (word or phrase that describes a noun)

R-from-alternative-spelling.label: {{R from alternative spelling}}
R-from-alternative-spelling.desc: redirect from a title with a different spelling

R-from-ASCII-only.label: {{R from ASCII-only}}
R-from-ASCII-only.desc: redirect from a title in only basic ASCII to the formal title, with differences that are not diacritical marks or ligatures

R-to-ASCII-only.label: {{R to ASCII-only}}
R-to-ASCII-only.desc: redirect to a title in only basic ASCII from the formal title, with differences that are not diacritical marks or ligatures

R-from-diacritic.label: {{R from diacritic}}
R-from-diacritic.desc: redirect from a page name that has diacritical marks (accents, umlauts, etc.)

R-to-diacritic.label: {{R to diacritic}}
R-to-diacritic.desc: redirect to the article title with diacritical marks (accents, umlauts, etc.)

R-from-misspelling.label: {{R from misspelling}}
R-from-misspelling.desc: redirect from a misspelling or typographical error

R-from-alternative-name.label: {{R from alternative name}}
R-from-alternative-name.desc: redirect from a title that is another name, a pseudonym, a nickname, or a synonym

R-from-ambiguous-sort-name.label: {{R from ambiguous sort name}}
R-from-ambiguous-sort-name.desc: redirect from an ambiguous sort name to a page or list that disambiguates it

R-from-former-name.label: {{R from former name}}
R-from-former-name.desc: redirect from a former or historic name or a working title

R-from-incorrect-name.label: {{R from incorrect name}}
R-from-incorrect-name.desc: redirect from an erroneus name that is unsuitable as a title

R-from-less-specific-name.label: {{R from less specific name}}
R-from-less-specific-name.desc: redirect from a less specific title to a more specific, less general one

R-from-long-name.label: {{R from long name}}
R-from-long-name.desc: redirect from a more complete title

R-from-more-specific-name.label: {{R from more specific name}}
R-from-more-specific-name.desc: redirect from a more specific title to a less specific, more general one

R-from-non-neutral-name.label: {{R from non-neutral name}}
R-from-non-neutral-name.desc: redirect from a title that contains a non-neutral, pejorative, controversial, or offensive word, phrase, or name

R-from-short-name.label: {{R from short name}}
R-from-short-name.desc: redirect from a title that is a shortened form of a person"s full name, a book title, or other more complete title

R-from-sort-name.label: {{R from sort name}}
R-from-sort-name.desc: redirect from the target"s sort name, such as beginning with their surname rather than given name

R-from-synonym.label: {{R from synonym}}
R-from-synonym.desc: redirect from a semantic synonym of the target page title

R-from-birth-name.label: {{R from birth name}}
R-from-birth-name.desc: redirect from a person"s birth name to a more common name

R-from-given-name.label: {{R from given name}}
R-from-given-name.desc: redirect from a person"s given name

R-from-married-name.label: {{R from married name}}
R-from-married-name.desc: redirect from a person"s married name to a more common name

R-from-name-with-title.label: {{R from name with title}}
R-from-name-with-title.desc: redirect from a person"s name preceded or followed by a title to the name with no title or with the title in parentheses

R-from-person.label: {{R from person}}
R-from-person.desc: redirect from a person or persons to a related article

R-from-personal-name.label: {{R from personal name}}
R-from-personal-name.desc: redirect from an individual"s personal name to an article titled with their professional or other better known moniker

R-from-surname.label: {{R from surname}}
R-from-surname.desc: redirect from a title that is a surname

R-from-drug-trade-name.label: {{R from drug trade name}}
R-from-drug-trade-name.desc: redirect from (or to) the trade name of a drug to (or from) the international nonproprietary name (INN)

R-from-filename.label: {{R from filename}}
R-from-filename.desc: redirect from a title that is a filename of the target

R-from-molecular-formula.label: {{R from molecular formula}}
R-from-molecular-formula.desc: redirect from a molecular/chemical formula to its technical or trivial name

R-from-gene-symbol.label: {{R from gene symbol}}
R-from-gene-symbol.desc: redirect from a Human Genome Organisation (HUGO) symbol for a gene to an article about the gene

R-to-scientific-name.label: {{R to scientific name}}
R-to-scientific-name.desc: redirect from the common name to the scientific name

R-from-scientific-name.label: {{R from scientific name}}
R-from-scientific-name.desc: redirect from the scientific name to the common name

R-from-alternative-scientific-name.label: {{R from alternative scientific name}}
R-from-alternative-scientific-name.desc: redirect from an alternative scientific name to the accepted scientific name

R-to-monotypic-taxon.label: {{R to monotypic taxon}}
R-to-monotypic-taxon.desc: redirect from the only lower-ranking member of a monotypic taxon to its monotypic taxon

R-from-monotypic-taxon.label: {{R from monotypic taxon}}
R-from-monotypic-taxon.desc: redirect from a monotypic taxon to its only lower-ranking member

R-taxon-with-possibilities.label: {{R taxon with possibilities}}
R-taxon-with-possibilities.desc: redirect from a title related to a living organism that potentially could be expanded into an article

R-from-name-and-country.label: {{R from name and country}}
R-from-name-and-country.desc: redirect from the specific name to the briefer name

R-from-more-specific-geographic-name.label: {{R from more specific geographic name}}
R-from-more-specific-geographic-name.tag: R from more specific geographic name
R-from-more-specific-geographic-name.desc: redirect from a geographic location that includes extraneous identifiers such as the county or region of a city

R-to-anchor.label: {{R to anchor}}
R-to-anchor.desc: redirect from a topic that does not have its own page to an anchored part of a page on the subject

R-from-file-metadata-link.label: {{R from file metadata link}}
R-from-file-metadata-link.desc: redirect of a wikilink created from EXIF, XMP, or other information (i.e. the "metadata" section on some image description pages)

R-to-list-entry.label: {{R to list entry}}
R-to-list-entry.desc: redirect to a list which contains brief descriptions of subjects not notable enough to have separate articles

R-mentioned-in-hatnote.label: {{R mentioned in hatnote}}
R-mentioned-in-hatnote.desc: redirect from a title that is mentioned in a hatnote at the redirect target

R-to-section.label: {{R to section}}
R-to-section.desc: similar to {{R to list entry}}, but when list is organized in sections, such as list of characters in a fictional universe

R-from-ambiguous-term.label: {{R from ambiguous term}}
R-from-ambiguous-term.desc: redirect from an ambiguous page name to a page that disambiguates it. This template should never appear on a page that has "(disambiguation)" in its title, use R to disambiguation page instead

R-from-incomplete-disambiguation.label: {{R from incomplete disambiguation}}
R-from-incomplete-disambiguation.desc: redirect from a page name that is too ambiguous to be the title of an article and should redirect to an appropriate disambiguation page

R-from-incorrect-disambiguation.label: {{R from incorrect disambiguation}}
R-from-incorrect-disambiguation.desc: redirect from a page name with incorrect disambiguation due to an error or previous editorial misconception

R-from-other-disambiguation.label: {{R from other disambiguation}}
R-from-other-disambiguation.desc: redirect from a page name with an alternative disambiguation qualifier

R-from-unnecessary-disambiguation.label: {{R from unnecessary disambiguation}}
R-from-unnecessary-disambiguation.desc: redirect from a page name that has an unneeded disambiguation qualifier

R-from-duplicated-article.label: {{R from duplicated article}}
R-from-duplicated-article.desc: redirect to a similar article in order to preserve its edit history

R-with-history.label: {{R with history}}
R-with-history.desc: redirect from a page containing substantive page history, kept to preserve content and attributions

R-from-move.label: {{R from move}}
R-from-move.desc: redirect from a page that has been moved/renamed

R-from-merge.label: {{R from merge}}
R-from-merge.desc: redirect from a merged page in order to preserve its edit history

R-from-remote-talk-page.label: {{R from remote talk page}}
R-from-remote-talk-page.desc: redirect from a talk page in any talk namespace to a corresponding page that is more heavily watched

R-to-category-namespace.label: {{R to category namespace}}
R-to-category-namespace.desc: redirect from a page outside the category namespace to a category page

R-to-help-namespace.label: {{R to help namespace}}
R-to-help-namespace.desc: redirect from any page inside or outside of help namespace to a page in that namespace

R-to-main-namespace.label: {{R to main namespace}}
R-to-main-namespace.desc: redirect from a page outside the main-article namespace to an article in mainspace

R-to-portal-namespace.label: {{R to portal namespace}}
R-to-portal-namespace.desc: redirect from any page inside or outside of portal space to a page in that namespace

R-to-project-namespace.label: {{R to project namespace}}
R-to-project-namespace.desc: redirect from any page inside or outside of project ("Wikipedia": or WP:) space to any page in the project namespace

R-to-user-namespace.label: {{R to user namespace}}
R-to-user-namespace.desc: redirect from a page outside the user namespace to a user page (not to a user talk page)

R-from-book.label: {{R from book}}
R-from-book.desc: redirect from a book title to a more general, relevant article

R-from-album.label: {{R from album}}
R-from-album.desc: redirect from an album to a related topic such as the recording artist or a list of albums

R-from-song.label: {{R from song}}
R-from-song.desc: redirect from a song title to a more general, relevant article

R-from-television-episode.label: {{R from television episode}}
R-from-television-episode.desc: redirect from a television episode title to a related work or lists of episodes

R-from-fictional-character.label: {{R from fictional character}}
R-from-fictional-character.desc: redirect from a fictional character to a related fictional work or list of characters

R-from-fictional-element.label: {{R from fictional element}}
R-from-fictional-element.desc: redirect from a fictional element (such as an object or concept) to a related fictional work or list of similar elements

R-from-fictional-location.label: {{R from fictional location}}
R-from-fictional-location.desc: redirect from a fictional location or setting to a related fictional work or list of places

R-to-article-without-mention.label: {{R to article without mention}}
R-to-article-without-mention.desc: redirect to an article without any mention of the redirected word or phrase

R-to-decade.label: {{R to decade}}
R-to-decade.desc: redirect from a year to the decade article

R-from-domain-name.label: {{R from domain name}}
R-from-domain-name.desc: redirect from a domain name to an article about a website

R-from-phrase.label: {{R from phrase}}
R-from-phrase.desc: redirect from a phrase to a more general relevant article covering the topic

R-from-list-topic.label: {{R from list topic}}
R-from-list-topic.desc: redirect from the topic of a list to the equivalent list

R-from-member.label: {{R from member}}
R-from-member.desc: redirect from a member of a group to a related topic such as the group or organization

R-to-related-topic.label: {{R to related topic}}
R-to-related-topic.desc: redirect to an article about a similar topic

R-from-school.label: {{R from school}}
R-from-school.desc: redirect from a school article that had very little information

R-from-subtopic.label: {{R from subtopic}}
R-from-subtopic.desc: redirect from a title that is a subtopic of the target article

R-to-subtopic.label: {{R to subtopic}}
R-to-subtopic.desc: redirect to a subtopic of the redirect"s title

R-from-Unicode-character.label: {{R from Unicode character}}
R-from-Unicode-character.desc: redirect from a single Unicode character to an article or Wikipedia project page that infers meaning for the symbol

R-from-Unicode-code.label: {{R from Unicode code}}
R-from-Unicode-code.desc: redirect from a Unicode code point to an article about the character it represents

R-with-possibilities.label: {{R with possibilities}}
R-with-possibilities.desc: redirect from a specific title to a more general, less detailed article (something which can and should be expanded)

R-from-ISO-4-abbreviation.label: {{R from ISO 4 abbreviation}}
R-from-ISO-4-abbreviation.desc: redirect from an ISO 4 publication title abbreviation to the unabbreviated title

R-from-ISO-639-code.label: {{R from ISO 639 code}}
R-from-ISO-639-code.desc: redirect from a title that is an ISO 639 language code to an article about the language

R-printworthy.label: {{R printworthy}}
R-printworthy.desc: redirect from a title that would be helpful in a printed or CD/DVD version of Wikipedia

R-unprintworthy.label: {{R unprintworthy}}
R-unprintworthy.desc: redirect from a title that would NOT be helpful in a printed or CD/DVD version of Wikipedia
